channel.title: Comments on: ArcGIS Online WebMaps and MapApps

item.title: By: Justin
item.dc:creator: Justin
item.description: Excellent! Thanks for the link. I'll check you that help doc.
item.content:encoded: Excellent! Thanks for the link. I’ll check you that help doc.

item.title: By: Nick P
item.dc:creator: Nick P
item.description:
good article Jason - one note, you can avoid having to limit the number of features in a shapefile by publishing the shapefile as a feature service - this is different than adding the shapefile to the map, you add it as content in ArcGIS Online - there is no limit to the number of features, I have uploaded shapefiles with over 400,000 parcels into ArcFIS Online with no problems
here is a help doc about it http://support.esri.com/cn/knowledgebase/techarticles/detail/42465
enjoy your blog - keep writing :)
item.content:encoded:
good article Jason – one note, you can avoid having to limit the number of features in a shapefile by publishing the shapefile as a feature service – this is different than adding the shapefile to the map, you add it as content in ArcGIS Online – there is no limit to the number of features, I have uploaded shapefiles with over 400,000 parcels into ArcFIS Online with no problems

here is a help doc about it http://support.esri.com/cn/knowledgebase/techarticles/detail/42465

enjoy your blog – keep writing ðŸ™‚
